definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
(arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
Hexi Corridor (or Gansu Corridor), a string of oases running the length of Gansu, forming part of the Northern Silk Road
triforium (gallery of arches above side-aisle vaulting in the nave of a church)

sentences.english: The former manufacturing hall now serves as an event hall.
sentences.chinese: 原生產長廊現用爲秀場長廊。

sentences.english: The Long Corridor is based on the corridor in JiangTian Temple in ZhengJiang, JiangSu Province.
sentences.chinese: 這個遊廊是仿江蘇省鎮江市“江天寺”而建的觀景廊。

sentences.english: Pots on both sides of each floor veranda door, which pass a small room, outside the pass Yan Lang.
sentences.chinese: 每層廊子兩側都有壺門，內通小室，外通檐廊。

sentences.english: The thermometer had dropped to 18 degrees below zero, but we still chose to sleep in the porch as usual.
sentences.chinese: 溫度表降到零下十八度的時候，我們也是在廊下睡覺。

sentences.english: There is a man-made waterfall in Yu Lang Bird Park.
sentences.chinese: 在裕廊飛禽公園有一個人工瀑布。

sentences.english: Nixon built a one-lane bowling alley below the driveway leading to the North Portico.
sentences.chinese: 尼克松在通向北門廊的行車道下方修了一條保齡球道。

sentences.english: "The musicians will sit in their gallery, " said the young Student.
sentences.chinese: “樂師們會坐在他們的廊廳中，”年輕的學生說。

sentences.english: Well, this is an image gallery.
The eastern facade is composed of loggias covered in bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 東部的門面是由涼廊中涉及竹子。

sentences.english: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon's porch.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌在殿裏所羅門的廊下行走。

sentences.english: Where an aisle is used to connect the existing building, it shall be regarded as new construction.
sentences.chinese: 但以過廊與原建築物連接者，應視爲新建。

sentences.english: They glassed in the open porch.
sentences.chinese: 他們將門廊用玻璃圍住。

sentences.english: On our left were the shops, their windows lighted, and the entrance to the galleria .
sentences.chinese: 我們的左面是店窗明亮的鋪子和商業街廊的入口。

sentences.english: Two-level landing Business Gallery to create a unique style.
sentences.chinese: 兩層高的落地商務廊，營造出獨特的風格。

sentences.english: GG:Gallery temper how big type, have you to how can break son unique Sun Sha at me?
sentences.chinese: 廊個脾氣怎麼大類，有你在我怎麼會斷子絕孫沙？

sentences.english: Welcome to Langxia. Langxia is a modern agricultural park.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來廊下，廊下是現代農業園區。
